description: McZinc Gold (Mono) is a high-quality zinc fertilizer containing Zinc Sulphate Monohydrate with 36% Zn and 17.5% S. It provides essential zinc nutrition for crops, preventing zinc deficiency symptoms and improving crop yield and quality.
application_rates: 2-4 Kg /acre, but if Zn deficiency symptom appears the dose may be doubled.; Uses McZinc Gold as broadcast during final land preparation & before sowing/transplanting.; In case of rice, this can be use as top dressing mixed with urea when the plant age is 20-25 DAT.; If didn't use during final land preparation, no tension, you can spray @ 20 gm / 10 Lit of water over the plants.; McZinc Gold can be mixed with any other fertilizer for use except Phosphate.
frequency_of_use: Apply during final land preparation or as top dressing 20-25 days after transplanting for rice
side_effect: Generally safe when used as directed. Avoid excessive application as it may cause zinc toxicity. Do not mix with phosphate fertilizers. Store in dry place away from children.
crops_pests: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Cotton, Tea, Mustard, Potato, Onion, Chili, Mango, Banana, Betel leaf, Brinjal, Cabbage, cauliflower etc.
crops: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Cotton, Tea, Mustard, Potato, Onion, Chili, Mango, Banana, Betel leaf, Brinjal, Cabbage, cauliflower
symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, stunted growth, reduced leaf size, poor fruit development
causes: Zinc deficiency in soil affecting plant growth and development
